io.micronaut.web.router

Interface ResourceRoute

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Route

    public interface ResourceRoute
extends Route

    A resource route is a composite route to a REST endpoint.

    Since:
    1.0
    Author:
    Graeme Rocher
